제목: 부동산중개계약에 관한 연구(1)
초록: 일반적으로 부동산은 다른 재화와 달리 지리적 위치의 고정성과 부증성 및 개별성이라는 특수성을 가지고 있음에 따라 공시제도라는 등기제도에 의하여 권리가 보호되고, 부동산거래에 있어서 공신력이 부정되는 등의 복잡한 법률관계가 존재하기 마련이다. 그러므로 부동산거래에 있어서는 부동산의 전문가인 부동산중개업자의 역할이 매우 중요하므로 부동산에 관한 전문성을 갖춘 부동산중개업자만이 중개업무를 담당하도록 하여야 필요가 있으며, 부동산중개계약 전에 부동산거래사고를 방지하기 위해 중개업자에게 중개대상물에 대한 확인설명의무 등 선관의무를 강화하여 전문가 책임을 지우고, 부동산중개계약을 정형화의무화할 수 있도록 하여 현실적으로 활용될 수 있는 방안이 제시되어야 한다.따라서 본고에서는 부동산중개계약과 관련된 판례를 분석하여 그 의의와 법적 성격을 검토하고, 부동산중개업자의 전문가 책임을 물을 수 있는 중개대상물의 확인설명의무 및 부동산중개업자의 보수청구권에 대하여 검토함으로써 그 해석론에 따른 입법론을 제시하면 다음과 같다. 첫째, 최근 논의가 되어 독일민법을 모델로 한 법무부의 민법중개정법룰안은 전형계약으로서의 주된 급부의무를 규정하고 중개계약의 법적성격을 위임계약에 준하는 것으로 보게 되어 부동산거래에서 분쟁이 발생하는 경우에 그 분쟁을 해결할 수 있는 방안이 될 수 있으며, 이러한 입법이 시행되더라도 시행착오가 크게 발생하지 않을 것으로 판단됨으로 개정안에 대하여 긍정적으로 평가된다. 둘째, 부동산중개계약에 있어서 전속중개계약을 의무화하고 중개업자의 전문가 책임을 더욱 강화하기 위하여 중개대상물건에 대하여 확인 및 설명의무를 더욱 강화함으로써 부동산거래사고를 미연에 방지할 수 있는 제도적 보완이 필요하다고 생각한다.

제목: 不動産 법이론의 體系에 관한 연구
초록:
1. CONTENTS(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVESReal estate has diverse characteristics to attain many purposes. Owing to its special characteristics different from those of other goods, real estate may result in formidable catastrophe if it is biased to public interest or private interest.(2) RESEARCH METHODThis study adopted the existing theoretical literature review(3) RESEARCH RESULTSThus, it is required to keep the balance of public interest or private interest. In serving such objective, the public law of real estate and private law of real estate conflict and cooperate each other. In connection with this matter, Constitutional Law abstractly presents the idea in the chapter of basic right provision and economy.
2. RESULTS
Receiving the idea, each individual law shall ensure that the confronting interest keeps harmony and balance in connection with real estate. It is also required that the confronting interest between public interest or private interest, possession and use as well as development and preservation keeps harmony.1. 제목: 부동산분야의 창업에 관한 검토
초록:
1. CONTENTS(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVESThis study is to provide alternative that reinforce the establishment of real estate area by examining the change of real estate business and the applied case of cooperation and connection framework for establishing. To obtain this study purpose, the existing and new viewpoint of real estate business has been reviewed in terms of area, the cooperation and connection framework for establishing has been addressed in terms of means and objective.(2) RESEARCH METHODThe reference of literature was collected as the research method and a description access mothed was applied(3) RESEARCH RESULTSThe findings of the study summarized as follows; ① Review of existing and new real estate business area ② Composing the cooperation framework as means for establishing ③ Composing the connection framework as objective for establishing ④ examining the case of cooperation and connection framework for establishing ⑤ groping the desirable direction for establishing.
2. RESULTS
The future direction of the establishment of real estate business will be developed in complying with information technology development and changing way of thinking will be the most important factor as follows. First, the establishment of real estate business should be done with a comprehensive thinking on environmental change. Second, it should be based on a positive thinking for complying with changing environment. Third, a effective thinking is required on social and economic benefits in the establishment of real estate business.1. 제목: 부동산 PF 자산유동화증권의 발행 구조 및 현황
초록: 부동산유동화증권은 부동산 개발사업의 주체인 시행사의 입장에서는 새로운 자금조달 수단으로 부각되었다. 과거 부동산을 담보로 간접금융시장에서 자금을 조달하여야만 했으나, ABS나 ABCP라는 증권 형태로 직접금융시장을 통해서도 부동산 개발사업 자금을 조달할 수 있게 되었다.부동산 PF 자산유동화증권 발행규모는 2006년 한해에만 ABS의 경우 약 6조원, ABCP는 약 9조원 정도로 추산되어, 자산유동화증권은 국내 민간 부동산 개발시장에 있어서 자금조달 수단의 가장 큰 축을 담당하고 있다고 볼 수 있다.본 연구는 이러한 자산유동화증권의 발행 구조 및 자금 조달 특성을 살펴보고, 실제 발행된 자산유동화증권 현황을 분석하고자 한다. 특히 부동산개발 관점에서 ABS를 통한 자금조달 현황을 개발용도 기준으로 분류하여 그 특성을 파악하고자 한다.The asset backed securities have emerged as a new financing vehicle in the position of developers. In the past we should have financed in indirect financial markets, but can finance with securities such as ABS or ABCP in direct financial markets.The issue amounts of real estate PF ABS and ABCP are estimated at about \ 6 trillion and \ 9 trillion each in 2006, therefore it seems that real estate securities constitute the biggest financing vehicle within the privately domestic real estate development market.On this study, we would examine the issuing structure and financing characteristic, and analysis the status of the actually issued securities. Particularly within the framework of real estate development, we would grasp the characteristic by classifying the status of the financing with ABS according to development uses.Real Estate Development, Real Estate Project Finance(PF), Asset Backed Security(ABS), Asset Backed Commercial Paper(ABCP).

제목: 부동산중개업자의 납세순응에 미치는 영향요인
초록: >본 연구는 부동산중개업자의 납세순응에 미치는 영향요인을 분석하고, 조세윤리와 세법지식의 인식차이에 따른 조절효과를 규명하고자 하는데 목적을 두었다. 종속변수는 납세순응으로 한정하였고, 독립변수는 제도적요인(조세부담, 세법복잡성, 적발확률, 정부혜택, 조세공평성)을, 조절변수는 개인적요인(조세윤리, 세법지식)을 선정하였다. 분석결과는 첫째, 조세부담과 적발확률은 부동산중개업자의 납세순응에 유의적인 영향을 미치는 것으로 나타났다. 조세부담은 조세윤리와 세법지식이 낮은 집단에서 유의적인 영향을 미치고, 적발확률은 조세윤리와 세법지식이 높은 집단과 낮은 집단 모두 유의적인 영향을 미치는 것으로 나타났다. 둘째, 세법복잡성ㆍ정부혜택ㆍ조세공평성은 납세순응에 유의적인 영향을 미치지 않는 것으로 나타났고, 조세윤리와 세법지식의 차이에 따른 결과에서도 유의적인 영향을 미치지 않는 것으로 나타났다.>The purpose of this study is to look for how the tax system effects on the tax compliance of the real estate broker, and how differently people recognizes between the taxation ethics and the knowledge of tax law. In the study, the independent variables are tax burden, the detecting probability for tax evasion, the government's taxation support policy, tax law complexity, and tax equity. A dependent variable is the tax compliance. The intervening variable is individual factors, such as knowledge of tax law and the taxation ethics. The findings are following;First, the tax compliance is significantly affected by tax burden and the detecting probability for tax evasion. Tax burden has positive effect on those who have low tax ethics and knowledge of tax law. The detecting probability for tax evasion has also positive influence on both in low and high groups. The government's taxation support policy, tax law complexity, and tax equity does not bring the significance on the consciousness of tax payment. So do the taxation ethics and the knowledge of tax law.Tax Compliance, Real Estate Brokers

제목: 부동산정책에 대한 전문가 평가분석- 한국역대 정부(전두환~노무현)를 중심으로 -
초록: 1. CONTENTS(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVESThere are many problems concerning housing in Korea as a result of a recent sharp run-up in real estate prices. This study sets out to review the characteristics of the housing policies implemented by successive Korean administrations, on the basis of which it analyses the overall level of public satisfaction with housing policies. The number of administrations was limited to the five most recent governments from that led by President Chun Doo-hwan to the current administration headed by President Roh Moo-hyun. A questionnaire survey was conducted asking respondents about their level of satisfaction with the real estate price stabilization policies, economic stimulation policies, anti-speculation policies and housing supply policies adopted by these administrations in order to elucidate the future direction of real estate policies.

제목: 부동산정책의 역사적 평가
초록: 부동산시장의 취약한 자율조정기능에 따른 문제의 발생은 형평성과 효율성을 위하여 정부가 어느 정도 시장에 개입하는 역할이 필요함을 뒷받침한다. 시대적 상황에 따라 차이는 있으나 부동산정책은 투기억제와 공급확대를 통한 부동산가격 안정을 주된 정책목표로 삼아왔다. 부동산정책 평가의 목적은 정책의 효과가 목표를 충족하고 있는지를 평가하는 것으로 정책기조 및 정책목표가 어느 정도 유지되고, 달성되었는지를 평가분석하는 작업이다. 부동산정책의 평가는 주로 가격이나 소유 같은 표면적인 현상을 진단하고, 평가하는 방향으로 이루어졌다. 그렇지만 부동산정책을 역사적 차원에서 평가하려면 단기적 시장효과뿐 아니라 중장기적으로 정책목표를 달성하는 제도적 기반의 확립이 고려되어야 한다. 이런 점을 고려할 때 부동산정책의 평가는 정책기조와 시장대책으로 나누어서 분석할 수 있다.Real estate policies aim to stability of market though different situations surrounding real estate market. Evaluation of real estate policies including tax, demand controls, housing supply is depended on market effects as it were expected. These evaluations are considered not only price changes but market efficiency and transparency.Policy package, Base of real estate policy, Measure for market stability

제목: 부동산 보유규모에 따른 가계 소비지출분석
초록: 본 연구는 2004년 ‘한국노동패널조사’ 7차 년도의 자료를 이용하여 가계의 부동산 보유규모별 가계소비지출비율의 차이와 영향력을 분석하였다. 구체적인 연구문제는 다음과 같다. 첫째, 가계의 부동산 보유유무 및 보유규모별 사회인구학적 특성차이를 분석한다. 둘째, 가계의 부동산 보유유무 및 보유규모별 가계자산비율 및 자산변수의 차이를 분석한다. 셋째, 가계의 부동산 보유유무 및 보유규모별 가계소비지출비율의 차이를 분석한다. 넷째, 가계의 부동산 보유유무 및 보유규모에 가계소비지출비율이 미치는 영향력을 분석한다. 이상의 연구문제를 분석한 결과를 요약하면 다음과 같다. 첫째, 부동산 보유가계와 부동산 미보유가계는 가구주연령, 자녀수, 가구원수, 가구주 교육수준과 배우자 유무의 유의한 차이를 나타냈다. 둘째, 부동산 보유규모가 클수록 총자산중 금융자산이 차지하는 비율이 낮아짐을 알 수 있었다. 셋째, 부동산을 보유할수록, 부동산 보유규모가 클수록 가계의 금융자산보유액, 부채보유액, 순자산보유액, 가계소득 및 소비지출액, 저축액이 큰 것으로 조사되었다. 넷째, 소비지출비율 중 식비와 외식비비율은 부동산을 보유하지 않거나 보유규모가 작은 가계가, 교육비의 비율은 부동산을 보유하거나 보유규모가 큰 가계가 더 큰 것으로 나타났다. 다섯째, 식비, 외식비, 사교육비는 부동산보유액 규모에 유의한 차이를 나타내며, 내구재비율과 주거비비율은 부동산 보유유무에 유의한 영향력을 나타냈다. 본 연구는 지금까지 선행되어온 재무 분석과는 달리, 가계의 부동산 보유유무와 보유규모별 가계자산 및 소비지출비율을 분석하고 부동산 보유유무 및 보유규모결정에 가계소비지출비율의 영향력을 분석하였다는 점에서 가치가 있다. 금융시장 및 부동산시장의 발전추이를 감안할 때 우리나라 가계의 재무구조는 금융자산과 부동산자산의 연계가 급속히 진전될 것이다. 따라서 본 연구는 이러한 자산시장변화에 유용한 기초자료가 될 것이다.This study explores the differences in the allotment of consumption expenditures of a household as well as the variables which will influence on the household consumption expenditure, based on the subjects; whether a household owns real property, what amount it has. The detailed subjects are as follows. The socio-demographic characteristics, ratio of each household property to total wealth, variables related to household financial property, and distribution of household consumption expenditure for a household are analysed in connection with the foregoing subjects. The influence of household consumption expenditure on the ownership and the amount of real property of a household are analysed. The results are as follows. First, a household owned real property is distinguished from a household owned none in its socio-demographic characteristics including the age of the household head, the number of the children, family size, the educational level of the household head and the marital status of the household head. Second, the results show that a household owns relatively less amount of liquid asset in the household property as it owns relatively more amount of real property, compared with other average households. Third, the results show that the amounts of liquid asset, debts, net asset, household income, household consumption expenditure, savings of a household increase in proportion with the amount of real property owned by the household. At the same time, those amounts are affected by whether the household owns real property. Fourth, a household owned no or relatively less real property tends to expend more in foodhousehold consumption expenditure, real property, liquid property, financial structure, asset market

제목: 부동산가격 변동이 은행 대출 및 경영성과에 미치는 영향
초록:
본 연구는 한국 자본시장을 대상으로 부동산가격 변동이 은행의 대출 및 경영성과에 미치는 영향을 살펴보았다. 본 연구의 표본기업은 1999년 6월부터 2006년 12월까지 국내 증권거래소에 상장된 은행을 대상으로 하며, 표본기업이 공시한 CAMEL 자료 및 거시경제지표를 기초로 분석에 필요한 변수를 설정하였다. 분석결과는 다음과 같다. 첫째, 주택가격지수증가율이 주택담보대출증가율에 유의한 양(+)의 영향을 미치는 것으로 나타나 부동산가격이 은행대출의 규모를 결정하는 요인이 되는 것으로 분석되었다. 둘째, BIS자기자본비율에 대한 주택가격지수증가율의 회귀계수가 유의한 정(+)의 값으로 나타나 부동산가격이 상승할수록 BIS자기자본비율을 증가시키는 것으로 해석되었다. 셋째, 주택가격지수증가율이 고정이하여신비율, 대손충담금적립비율, 무수익여신비율에 유의한 음(-)의 반응을 보여 부동산가격이 상승(하락)할수록 여신건전성이 개선(악화)됨이 발견되었다. 넷째, 은행의 수익성지표 중 자기자본이익률과 주택가격지수증가율 간에 유의한 정(+)의 관계가 존재하는 것으로 나타나 부분적으로 나마 부동산가격 변동이 은행의 수익성에 영향을 미친다는 결과를 얻었다.The purposes of this paper is to investigate how fluctuation of real estate affects bank loan and performance in the Korean capital market. Setting the banks listed on the domestic stock exchange from June 1999 to December 2006 as standard enterprise, this research established variables necessary for analysis on the basis of CAMEL data announced by standard enterprises. 
The results of this study are summarized as follows. First, it was found that the correlation analysis of increasing rate of house collateral loan and fluctuation of real estate price shows statistically significant result. Second, the fluctuation of house price was positively related BIS adequacy ratio. Third, the fluctuation of house price was negatively related FIR, PRO, NPLR. Fourth, the fluctuation of house price was positively related ROE.
The above results imply that while the performance of bank is affected by the business of real estate, it may be further aggravated when the business of real estate declines and the influence may be increased depending on the loan structure and form. 
This study may be useful to improve the performance of bank and to decide the real estate policy through enhancement of loan soundness and financial risk control before introducing new BIS capital accord in connection with relation between fluctuation of real estate price and performance of bank and increment of real estate collateral loan of financial institutions.The purposes of this paper is to investigate how fluctuation of real estate affects bank loan and performance in the Korean capital market. Setting the banks listed on the domestic stock exchange from June 1999 to December 2006 as standard enterprise, this research established variables necessary for analysis on the basis of CAMEL data announced by standard enterprises. 
The results of this study are summarized as follows. First, it was found that the correlation analysis of increasing rate of house collateral loan and fluctuation of real estate price shows statistically significant result. Second, the fluctuation of house price was positively related BIS adequacy ratio. Third, the fluctuation of house price was negatively related FIR, PRO, NPLR. Fourth, the fluctuation of house price was positively related ROE.
The above results imply that while the performance of bank is affected by the business of real estate, it may be further aggravated when the business of real estate declines and the influence may be increased depending on the loan structure and form. 
This study may be useful to improve the performance of bank and to decide the real estate policy through enhancement of loan soundness and financial risk control before introducing new BIS capital accord in connection with relation between fluctuation of real estate price and performance of bank and increment of real estate collateral loan of financial institutions.Bank Loan, Performance of Bank, Fluctuation of Real Estate Price, BIS.

제목: 不動産 競賣의 稅法上 爭點에 관한 연구
부동산 가격형성요인을 고려한 매수인 기반의 검색시스템 설계
초록:
국내 부동산 시장의 가격안정화를 위한 대안 중 하나로 본 연구에서는 부동산 중개업 시장에 적용할 수 있는 중개 에이전트 시스템을 제안한다. 지금까지 국내 부동산 중개업 시장은 그 영세성으로 말미암아 시장개방화에 따른 경쟁력 상실이 우려되고, 학술적 연구에서도 중개업 시장의 현황 및 제도적 발전방향만이 제시되었다. 이에 본 연구에서는 부동산 중개업체가 매도자와 매수인간의 효과적인 중개역할을 지원해 줄 수 있는 시스템적 접근방안으로 에이전트 중개모델을 개발하고, 본 모델을 통해 매수인의 부동산 탐색비용을 줄이면서도 효율적으로 탐색할 수 있는 시스템을 설계하고, 프로토타입을 구현한다. 이를 위해 부동산 시장의 수요－공급을 통한 가격형성과정을 시스템 다이내믹스를 통해 더욱 세부적으로 분석함으로써 부동산 가격형성요인으로 지역 및 개별요인이 중요한 변수임을 도출한다. 본 중개 에이전트 시스템은 매수인의 아파트에 대한 가치만족도를 높이면서도 낮은 가격의 부동산을 효과적으로 탐색 및 분석해 줌으로써 부동산 시장을 더욱 선(善)순환하게 만들어준다.As one of the alternative ways for price stabilization in the domestic real estate market, this study has tried to suggest a brokerage agent system that can be applied to the real estate brokerage market. Until now, because of the small scale of domestic real estate brokerage market, there have been many worries that market opening can cause the loss of competitiveness. Also, most academic researches have mainly focused only on the analysis of brokerage market situation and on its system development. 
However, in order to make a system approach that can support an effective brokerage role between buyers and sellers, this study has developed an agent brokerage model, and by using this model, we have succeeded in designing a new system, as well as its prototype, that can reduce the costs of searching real estate and also make it possible to search efficiently. To this end, through system dynamics, this study has made an in－depth analysis of the price determination process based on the supply and demand of real estate market. As a result of this research, we have found out that both regional factor and specific individual factor are key variables to the real estate price determination.
This new brokerage system is to raise not only the value satisfaction of buyer’s real estate, but also make it possible to effectively search and analyze the related real estate, consequently bringing a virtuous cycle to the real estate market.As one of the alternative ways for price stabilization in the domestic real estate market, this study has tried to suggest a brokerage agent system that can be applied to the real estate brokerage market. Until now, because of the small scale of domestic real estate brokerage market, there have been many worries that market opening can cause the loss of competitiveness. Also, most academic researches have mainly focused only on the analysis of brokerage market situation and on its system development. 
However, in order to make a system approach that can support an effective brokerage role between buyers and sellers, this study has developed an agent brokerage model, and by using this model, we have succeeded in designing a new system, as well as its prototype, that can reduce the costs of searching real estate and also make it possible to search efficiently. To this end, through system dynamics, this study has made an in－depth analysis of the price determination process based on the supply and demand of real estate market. As a result of this research, we have found out that both regional factor and specific individual factor are key variables to the real estate price determination.
This new brokerage system is to raise not only the value satisfaction of buyer’s real estate, but also make it possible to effectively search and analyze the related real estate, consequently bringing a virtuous cycle to the real estate market.Real Estate Information, Agent System, Real Estate Price Determination Factors, System Dynamics

제목: 부동산등기의 전자신청에 관한 소고
초록:
기존의 부동산등기는 당사자의 신청 또는 관공서의 촉탁에 의해 행해지는 ‘신청주의’가 원칙이며, 등기의 신청은 등기권리자와 등기의무자가 공동으로 하는 것이 원칙이다(부동산등기법 제28조). 이 경우 등기는 등기권리자와 등기의무자 또는 대리인이 등기소에 출석하여 이를 신청하여야 한다(부동산등기법 제28조). 그러나 부동산등기법의 개정으로 2006년 6월 1일부터는 이러한 출석주의의 예외를 인정하여 부동산등기를 인터넷을 통해 신청할 수 있도록 하는 제도가 도입되어, 어디서나 장소에 관계없이 편리하고 신속하게 부동산등기를 신청할 수 있는 길이 열리게 되었다. 하지만 이러한 부동산등기의 전자신청이 활성화되는 데는 ① 등기신청에 사용된 공인인증서의 진정성 문제, ② 첨부문서의 진정성 문제, ③ 등기관련 지적자료의 전자적 기록 문제, ④ 복잡한 신청절차에 대한 문제, ⑤ 정보소외 계층의 문제, ⑥ 법인 등의 등기신청제한 문제, ⑦ 개인정보보호 문제 등 몇 가지 장애요인이 있는 것으로 보인다. 이에 본 논문에서는 우리나라와 일본 등의 부동산등기의 전자신청절차에 관해 간단히 살펴 본 후 현행 전자신청제도의 문제점에 대한 개선방안을 제시하고자 한다.As a general rule, real-estate registration should be requested by the person entitled to make registration and the person liable for registration. But, Registration of Real Estate Act was amend in May 10, 2006. And this act has been effective since June 1, 2006. By this amendment, It is possible for us to do the electronic application of the real-estate registration. 
 However, This electronic application system has various problems to revitalize : (1) the reality of the certificate to be used in application of the real-estate registration, (2) the reality of attached documents, (3) electronic records of data about the record of land registration, (4) complicated procedure in the electronic application, (5) neglected people in the information, (6) limitation of electronic application by legal person, (7) protection of personal information. 
 So, this study reviewed and analyzed above problems. And then, this study offered solutions to these problems.As a general rule, real-estate registration should be requested by the person entitled to make registration and the person liable for registration. But, Registration of Real Estate Act was amend in May 10, 2006. And this act has been effective since June 1, 2006. By this amendment, It is possible for us to do the electronic application of the real-estate registration. 
 However, This electronic application system has various problems to revitalize : (1) the reality of the certificate to be used in application of the real-estate registration, (2) the reality of attached documents, (3) electronic records of data about the record of land registration, (4) complicated procedure in the electronic application, (5) neglected people in the information, (6) limitation of electronic application by legal person, (7) protection of personal information. 
 So, this study reviewed and analyzed above problems. And then, this study offered solutions to these problems.real-estate registration, electronic application, registration application by internet, problems of electronic application, reform measures of electronic application

제목: 부동산컨설팅업의 현황과 실태분석
초록:
1. CONTENTS
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
The purpose of this study is to evaluate the real estate consulting in Korea using the survey for specialists of real estate.

(2) RESEARCH METHOD
This study was focused on survey analysis. The data for this analysis were collect from the questionnaire. This questionnaire consisted of the status of real estate market in Korea and the problems of real estate consulting regime. Especially this study used to the crosstabulation analysis and the analysis of variance(ANOVA).
(3) RESEARCH FINDINGS
In the results of this survey, the most important problem is the absent of certificated licence of real estate consulting. 

2. RESULTS
This study offers two alternatives to improve the real estate consulting in Korea. 1) It is strongly suggested introducing an authorized licence system for real estate consulting. 2) Industrial classification system in Korea should be supplement the real estate consulting area.1. CONTENTS
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
The purpose of this study is to evaluate the real estate consulting in Korea using the survey for specialists of real estate.

(2) RESEARCH METHOD
This study was focused on survey analysis. The data for this analysis were collect from the questionnaire. This questionnaire consisted of the status of real estate market in Korea and the problems of real estate consulting regime. Especially this study used to the crosstabulation analysis and the analysis of variance(ANOVA).
(3) RESEARCH FINDINGS
In the results of this survey, the most important problem is the absent of certificated licence of real estate consulting. 

2. RESULTS
This study offers two alternatives to improve the real estate consulting in Korea. 1) It is strongly suggested introducing an authorized licence system for real estate consulting. 2) Industrial classification system in Korea should be supplement the real estate consulting area.real estate consulting, authorized consulting licence, industrial classification system

제목: 不動産登記의 推定力에 對한 考察
초록:
1. CONTENTS 
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
In Korea, the validity of real estate registration on the operative law is authorized the effect of fluctuation of rights, conclusive effect of the precedence, and counteractive effect. On the theory of the interpretation it is the authorized presumptive effect. But it isn't authorized the public trust. Consequently it's the reality that can't protect the person who trusts the register. In the view of this reality, the legal significance about the presumptive effect of the validity of real estate registration is considerably large. It is obvious the law relation would become very different according to the theory of the interpretation. Therefore this study has an purpose to search for the reasonable theory of the interpretation.
(2) RESEARCH METHOD 
We choose literature research methods through various kinds of material domestic books and theses.

(3) RESEARCH RESULTS
Although the theory of the probability is the predominant opinion on the foundation of sanction of the presumptive effect, it is not right that the basis of the presumptive effect puts only on the probability. In the essence of the presumptive effect, there is a conflict between the theory of the presumptive effect in law and the theory of the presumptive effect in actual fact. The former is more appropriate than the latter. There is an opposition between the opinion that the presumptive effect is the presumption of rights and the one that it is the presumption of fact. The former is proper. In the personal scope that the presumptive effect reaches, there is a view which the presumption effect is not authorized among the parties but it would be adequate that it is authorized among the parties. 

2. RESULTS 
The presumption effect must seek for the substantial grounds in the probability, the contents on the register can be coincided with the real right's relation. And the basis in the positive law must be the civil law article 200. And under our legislation which the public trust is not authorized, the presumption effect vests a favor status in a lawsuit to the person who trusts the register. It can contribute the security of the a real estate transaction. The presumption effect must be the presumptive effect in law.
The presumption effect is the presumption of rights. Therefore a fact of originated cause of the such rights and existed agent's authority is presumed. And the presumption effect reaches the impleader as well as the parties of fluctuations of real rights. 
The rebuttal against the presumption is generally accomplished simply by proof of the fact that are not reconcilable with the substantive and procedural fact. And in case of ‘Special Statutes of Registration Procedure’, given the procedural characteristics and the legislative goals, in addition to the substantive and registration procedural fact, the scope of presumption encompasses every other fact needed for the recorded right.1. 제목: 부동산평가에 있어 정상가격주의
초록:
1. CONTENTS
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
Fair market value is one of the most vital concepts in the appraisal theory of real estate. In the case of the personal estate setting production forth as a premise, the terms of fair market value are scarcely used. But, in the real estate holding the characteristics of site value, the grasp of fair market value, nowadays, became important socially and economically.
Therefore, the discussions on fair market value are of vital importance in several real estate activities through the medium of real estate price. Nevertheless, the fair market values of real estate are still poor in discussions.
(2) RESEARCH METHOD
In this study, I will try to find a solution to a problem regarding how to interpret a concept on the fair market value of real estate from our appraisal environment.

(3) RESEARCH RESULTS
First of all, the definitions on the fair market value as to real estate price will be examined. And then, the meanings, the definition of fair market value symbolizes concretely, will be discussed. Fair market value will be viewed, chiefly, on the basis of price change phenomena realized in real estate markets.

2. RESULTS
Then, from this, a symbol the concept named fair market value keeps will be drawn. In view of the study results so far achieved, I arrived at recognition which the spot, where the ceaseless discussions on fair market value are taking place, means the very spot the technical appraisals exist.1. 제목: 부동산관리계획의 이론적 고찰 및 작성사례
초록:
1. CONTENTS
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
There has recently been a drastic increase in the number of the indirect investment systems (real estate investments trusts, real estate trust, and real estate funds) which numerous investors take part in, Therefore, a professional and transparent management of real property is required.
On the other hand in real estate sectors, social, administrative, and economic factors, that is, its situation, are co-relatively changing. So we also need a professional management due to the unsustainable highest and best use of the real estate affected incessantly by the above changes.
Also the objective of the real estate management formerly was the FM(Facility Management) which stressed on an agreeable environment and safety. Today this trend is gradually shifted to PM(Property Management) and AM(Asset Management) such as purchase and sellout of the real property for the purpose of obtaining objectives of the owners and investors, analysis of the profit rates, surveying the assets, and activities of rent and loan.
So this research is aimed at sharing the information with the managers who want to do a professional real estate management through the study and application of the real estate management plans which is the main contents of the real estate management and thus inducing a highest and best use minimizing the social costs.

(2) RESEARCH METHOD
Document surveys on IREM publications, professional books, publications of the association, degree dissertations, and the application of the researchers own actual business materials.

(3) RESEARCH RESULTS
I have drafted the real estate management plans, in current difficult situation for obtaining objectives I presented practices for obtaining objectives through the manager's alternative methods.

2. RESULTS
In real estate management plan and property management agreement are also the criteria the communication between the owner and the client. In this study I found out management theories which is the main contents of the real estate management as the social needs requiring PM such as obtaining highest and best use, activation of indirect investment, aiming at the owner's obtaining of the objectives.
Also I tried to realize the method for obtaining the owner's objectives through the actual cases of management plan, the procedure for drafting management plan, practice of management issues and alternative methods, cost profit analysis, and conclusion and recommendation1. CONTENTS

제목: 不動産을 目的物로 하는 信託의 法律關係
초록:
신탁법은 물권법과 계약법을 연결시키는 새로운 법적 수단을 창조할 수 있는 잠재적 중요성을 가진 분야라고 생각된다. 또한, 신탁제도는 사회적인 기부문화를 형성하는 법적 토대가 될 수 있고, 증여 또는 상속 이후에도 기부자 또는 피상속인의 고상한 뜻에 따라 합당하게 재산이 사용될 수 있도록 통제하고 관리할 수 있는 법적 수단을 제공할 수 있다. 이러한 현상이 사회적으로 활성화된다면 가족관계를 포함하여 사회적 문화적 변동의 주춧돌이 될 수도 있다. 이러한 배경을 염두에 두고, 부동산과 관련된 신탁의 법률관계를 살펴 보면 많은 난제들을 만나게 되고 앞으로 좋은 신탁법을 만들어가야 할 학문적 과제를 깨닫게 된다. 이러한 상황 인식의 첫 걸음은 오늘날 현실 거래계에서 발생하는 신탁의 법률관계를 섭렵하고 그 구체적인 문제점들을 규명하고 서로 의견을 공유하는 것이라 생각된다. 이런 차원에서, 이 글은 모든 물건 중 왕좌를 차지하고 있는 부동산을 목적물로 하여 이루어지는 신탁의 법률관계를 분야별로 고찰하고 각 분야에서 제기되는 다양한 쟁점사항들에 대한 법리적 해답을 찾는 데 그 목적을 두었다. 우선 부동산신탁은 그 목적에 따라 토지신탁, 처분신탁, 담보신탁, 관리신탁 등으로 분류된다. 또한 부동산신탁의 유형에 속하는 것은 아니지만 이른바 부동산펀드의 경우에도 부동산을 목적으로 하는 신탁의 법률관계가 이용된다. 그 밖에 자산유동화, 부동산개발금융 등 다른 거래영역에서도 신탁이 이용될 수 있다. 신탁계약이 요물계약인지 낙성계약인지에 관해서는 이를 낙성계약으로 보는 견해가 현대적 경향이다. 신탁의 본지에 따라 위탁자가 부동산을 사용 수익하는 경우 그 법적 성질은 수익권으로 파악하는 것이 합리적이다. 또한, 신탁의 법률관계에서 앞으로 더욱 규명하여야 할 과제로는, 수동신탁의 개념과 효력 문제, 위탁자 또는 수익자의 지시권 내지 동의권의 효력, 사해신탁의 판단기준, 신탁재산과 수탁자의 고유재산 상호간에 이루어지는 거래관계의 허용 여부, 부동산 신탁원부의 대항력, 위탁자의 지위 이전과 변경등기의 허용 여부 등이 포함된다.This Article is focused on civil law effects of real estate trust in Korea, rather than regulatory or other aspects thereof. The Korean Trust Law, being a congressional legislation, has been mostly influenced by the Japanese Trust Law, which in turn modeled the English, American and Indian trust laws. This unique mixed features generally cause a substantial amount of technical complexity with respect to the interpretation of the Korean Trust Law. 

The author believes that the Korean trust law has the potential of facilitating the interconnection of the Korean property law and the contract law. In general, a real estate trust is classified into trust for land development, trust for disposal purpose, trust for security purpose and trust for management purpose. In terms of terminology, a real estate fund is not included in the notion of real estate trust in Korea; nonetheless, a real estate fund also is based upon a trust contract and therefore is also addressed under this Article. In addition, a trust contract is also used under other transactional context such as an asset-backed securitization, structured financing, or real estate development project. 

The major legal issues under the Korean trust contract (being addressed in this Article) include, among others, (a) what is the legal nature of trustor’s right to possess or use a real property under the trust, (b) whether or not a passive trust is valid, (c) whether or not a trustor or beneficiary is permitted to have a right of instruction or consent with respect to the disposal of real property in trust, (d) what is the criteria to determine a fraudulent conveyance in trust, (e) whether or not a transaction between a trust estate and a trustee’s own account is legally permitted, (f) what legal effect is given to the trust registry of real property vis-à-vis third parties, and (g) whether or not a trustor’s legal status can be assigned to a third party.This Article is focused on civil law effects of real estate trust in Korea, rather than regulatory or other aspects thereof. The Korean Trust Law, being a congressional legislation, has been mostly influenced by the Japanese Trust Law, which in turn modeled the English, American and Indian trust laws. This unique mixed features generally cause a substantial amount of technical complexity with respect to the interpretation of the Korean Trust Law. 

The author believes that the Korean trust law has the potential of facilitating the interconnection of the Korean property law and the contract law. In general, a real estate trust is classified into trust for land development, trust for disposal purpose, trust for security purpose and trust for management purpose. In terms of terminology, a real estate fund is not included in the notion of real estate trust in Korea; nonetheless, a real estate fund also is based upon a trust contract and therefore is also addressed under this Article. In addition, a trust contract is also used under other transactional context such as an asset-backed securitization, structured financing, or real estate development project. 

The major legal issues under the Korean trust contract (being addressed in this Article) include, among others, (a) what is the legal nature of trustor’s right to possess or use a real property under the trust, (b) whether or not a passive trust is valid, (c) whether or not a trustor or beneficiary is permitted to have a right of instruction or consent with respect to the disposal of real property in trust, (d) what is the criteria to determine a fraudulent conveyance in trust, (e) whether or not a transaction between a trust estate and a trustee’s own account is legally permitted, (f) what legal effect is given to the trust registry of real property vis-à-vis third parties, and (g) whether or not a trustor’s legal status can be assigned to a third party.- Trust for Security Purpose - Trust for Management Purpose - Trust for Disposal Purpose - Land Trust - Land Development Trust - Real Estate Trust - REIT - Real Estate Fund - Real Estate Development Project Financing - Project Financing Vehicle - Passive Trust - Trustee’s Fiduciary Duty - Trustee’s Duty of Care - Intent of Trust - Purpose of Trust - Purpose of Trust - Beneficiary Right - Beneficiary - Trustor - Trustee - Trustor’s Right of Instruction - Trustor’s Right of Consent - Beneficiary’s Right of Instruction - Beneficiary’s Right of Consent - Fraudulent Conveyance in Trust - Residential Lease Protection Law - Primary Issuance of Beneficiary Right - Secondary Transfer of Beneficiary Right - Transfer of Trustor’s Legal Status - Transfer of Debt Liabilities under Trust - Transfer of Contracts under Trust - Bankruptcy-remoteness of Trust for Security Purpose)

제목: 부동산교부세의 배분방안에 관한 연구
초록:
이 논문은 부동산교부세의 배분방식을 구체적으로 검토함으로써 현행 배분방식이 지닌 문제점을 분석하고 그 목적과 배분방식에 있어서 긴밀한 연관을 맺고 있는 보통교부세를 함께 고려함으로써 재정형평화의 제고라는 두 제도의 기본적인 목적을 보다 잘 달성할 수 있는 배분방안을 모색한다.
부동산교부세의 재정형평화효과에 대한 분석 결과 부동산교부세 중 자치단체간의 재정형평화를 주목적으로 하는 잔여재원의 경우 그 자체로는 시·군지역, 시지역, 군지역간의 재정형평화를 개선하는 것으로 분석되었다. 그러나 보통교부세와 부동산교부세의 잔여재원을 함께 배분하는 경우에는 보통교부세만 배분하는 경우에 비하여 재정형평화 기능이 오히려 저해되는 것으로 나타났다. 따라서 부동산교부세의 잔여재원을 별도의 배분방법에 의하여 자치단체에 배분하는 것보다 보통교부세의 재원에 편입하여 배분함함으로써 재정형평화의 제고라는 목적을 보다 잘 달성할 수 있다. 
한편 최근 정부는 제도 개편을 통해 부동산교부세의 잔여재원(균형재원)을 교육, 사회복지 등 현안수요가 많은 분야에 활용 될 수 있도록 잔여재원의 배분방식을 조정하였는데, 이러한 배분방식의 개편으로 인해 재정형평화 효과는 더욱 저하되는 것으로 나타났다. 결론적으로 부동산교부세의 배분방식을 세분하여 제도를 복잡하게 설계하는 것보다 보통교부세의 배분방식을 이용하는 것이 최근 자치단체의 재정압박 문제의 해소와 재정형평화 기능의 제고를 위해 보다 바람직한 것으로 분석되었다.This paper examines the distribution of real-estate share tax in addition to local share tax, which is closely related to real-estate share tax with respect to objective and distribution method. The analysis on fiscal equalization of real-estate share tax shows that residual revenue source whose major objective is fiscal equalization among local governments improves fiscal equalization in cities and counties. However, when both real-estate tax and local share tax are distributed separately, the fiscal equalization effect is smaller than when only local share tax is distributed. Accordingly, it might be better to distribute residual revenue source of real-estate share tax with incorporated into revenue source of local share tax rather than to distribute it separately in another way. The government is planning to adjust the distribution method of residual revenue source in order for the source to be used for the sectors such as education and social welfare. This study, however, finds that the plan might worsen fiscal equalization. It seems desirable to solve fiscal stress from education and social welfare demand of local governments by using distribution method of local share tax rather than make the system complicated by subdividing the distribution method of real-estate share tax. After 2007, local share tax is newly reinforced with the categories of the social welfare sector, reflecting demand of local governments for the social welfare sector. Therefore, distributing residual revenue source of real-estate share tax incorporated into local share tax might not only relieve fiscal stress of local governments from education and social welfare demand to some extent but also improve equalization of local share tax.local share tax, real-estate share tax, fiscal equalization, theil index

제목: 부동산정책변화와 주택경매 낙찰가율 변동추세에 관한 연구
초록:
1. CONTENTS
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
As a result of government's continuous enactments of real estate price policies between 2005~2006, the property prices in 2007 is showing to be very stable. However, although real estate policies had been enacted, the bid price rate in the property auction market seems to be on the rise. Subsequently, we aim to find out what effects the real estate policies are imposing on the housing auction market, which will help to increase the return on the investments. 
(2) RESEARCH METHOD
By using the information provided by the Korea Asset Management Corporation, the current status of the nation wide auction market, and the auction for apartments in Seoul, were reviewed and analyzed. With the real estate policy enactments, its contents were analyzed, and how it affected the bid prices in Seoul Apartment auctions.

(3) RESEARCH RESULTS
The apartment auction bidding prices and the market interest rate were definitely related. This indicates that if the government increases the interest rate of the financial market to stabilize the property market, the actual value of the property deteriorates.

2. RESULTS
When investing in the property auctions, the real estate policies must be analyzed and a very careful investments should be made in accordance to the future financial related real estate policies. The property auctions should be taken on with serious regards to the risk involved with auctions and the uncertainties of future. Especially, if interest rate changes are anticipated, it must be remembered that there will be changes in the return on investments for the auctions.1. CONTENTS
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
As a result of government's continuous enactments of real estate price policies between 2005~2006, the property prices in 2007 is showing to be very stable. However, although real estate policies had been enacted, the bid price rate in the property auction market seems to be on the rise. Subsequently, we aim to find out what effects the real estate policies are imposing on the housing auction market, which will help to increase the return on the investments. 
(2) RESEARCH METHOD
By using the information provided by the Korea Asset Management Corporation, the current status of the nation wide auction market, and the auction for apartments in Seoul, were reviewed and analyzed. With the real estate policy enactments, its contents were analyzed, and how it affected the bid prices in Seoul Apartment auctions.

(3) RESEARCH RESULTS
The apartment auction bidding prices and the market interest rate were definitely related. This indicates that if the government increases the interest rate of the financial market to stabilize the property market, the actual value of the property deteriorates.

2. RESULTS
When investing in the property auctions, the real estate policies must be analyzed and a very careful investments should be made in accordance to the future financial related real estate policies. The property auctions should be taken on with serious regards to the risk involved with auctions and the uncertainties of future. Especially, if interest rate changes are anticipated, it must be remembered that there will be changes in the return on investments for the auctions.Changes in Real Estate Policy, Changes in Interest Rate, bid price rate, property auction, return on investments.

제목: 부동산서비스업 종사자의 임파워먼트가 직무만족과 조직몰입에 미치는 영향에 관한 연구
초록:
1. CONTENTS

(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES 
This study was designed to both analyze and identify the effects of empowerment on job satisfaction and organizational commitment of employees in real estate service business. Consequently, the result of the study showed that they closely influence each other. Based on it, the implication for efficient human resource management is suggested.
(2) RESEARCH METHOD
A total of 145 samples were collected through questionnaires about the real estate service business(real estate appraisal industry) in Daejeon and Chungnam. The next step was to analyze various types: frequency analysis, factor analysis, reliability analysis and multiple regression analysis. 

(3) RESEARCH RESULTS
The results of analysis are as followings; 
First, results represented that factor analysis and reliability analysis were valid and reliable survey tool. Second, multiple regression examined the relationship between the empowerment and job satisfaction. The results about the multiple regression analysis of effective factors of empowerment and job satisfaction are as followings; 
The meaning of individual task had the positive influence on colleague satisfaction(β=.523; p<.0001), superior satisfaction (β=.356; p<.0001), task satisfaction(β=.558; p<.000), which constitute job satisfaction. In addition, the influence of individual task showed statistical significance only on wage satisfaction (β=.280; p<0.005) and superior satisfaction(β=.177; p<.05). However, the individual task ability had no influence on any of four constituent variables for job satisfaction which is a dependant variable.
Moreover, the multiple regression analysis of effective factors of empowerment and organizational commitment are like followings; 
The meaning of individual task, which is the measurement variable, showed statistically significant effect on emotional commitment (β=.281; p<.0005) and normative commitment(β=.187; p<.0). And the influence of individual task had statistically significant effect on emotional commitment(β=.240; p<0.005), normative commitment(β=.187; p<.05), while having no statistically significant effect on continuous commitment. However, the personal task abilityno statistically significant influence on all measure variables of organizational commitment. 

2. RESULTS 
Empowerment of employees in real estate service business influenced job satisfaction and organizational commitment. In other words, among the empowerment three factors, the meaning of individual business and the impact of individual business were significant as factors that influenced job satisfaction and organizational commitment1. 제목: 부동산 투자매력속성이 투자자의 실현수익률과 투자만족도에 미치는 영향
초록:
1. CONTENTS
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
The objective of this research is to look into the general trend of attractive properties of investment which the investors in real estate are inclined to pursue and the influence of the attractive properties of investment in real estate on realized rate of return and investors' satisfaction with investment.

(2) RESEARCH METHOD
- -
The data were analyzed by SPSS WIN 12.0 program. The analytical methods used in this study were frequency, mean, factor analysis, correlation analysis, multiple regression, logistic regression. To verify the reliability of each measure, Cronbach's alpha coefficient was used.

(3) RESEARCH RESULTS
According to the research survey, it was found that Investors pursued payback possibility the most among attractive properties of investment and pursued by the order of accessibility, guaranty of earnings, developmental possibility, possibility of authorization and permission.

2. RESULTS
The influence of the attractive properties of investment in real estate on realized rate of return was found to come out by the order of developmental possibility, guaranty of earnings, and possibility of authorization and permission. 
As a result of survey on the attractive properties of investment in real estate, the guaranty factor of earnings was found to show the highest increase rate followed by the accessibility factor.1. CONTENTS

제목: 부동산중개의뢰인의 중개사무소선택속성에 관한 연구
초록:
1. CONTENTS
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
As competition in the real estate brokerage market is expected to intensify, this study intends to look into the criteria by which a client chooses a real estate agency and to develop a new model for agency selection, in an effort to prepare solutions for an agency to gain an advantage over other competing agencies and differentiate itself from them.
(2) RESEARCH METHODS
Difference analysis and One-way ANOVA through the mean and standard deviation of variables

(3) RESEARCH RESULTS
Clients tend to choose real estate agencies according to the reliability of representatives, location, efficient handling of requests, the establishment of service warranty, and satisfaction with their service. Clients also take into account the characteristics of representatives, the environmental characteristics of agencies, the quality of service, the relationship between representatives and employees, and the characteristics of agency management as a whole.

2. RESULTS
(1)For the characteristics of representatives, clients think the most important factor is their reliability; for the environment characteristics of agencies, location was considered most critical. When it comes to the quality of service, clients value representatives' service attitudes the most. While satisfaction with the service was thought most important in the relationship between representatives and employees, clients perceive a reasonable cost as the most important element in the characteristics of agency management.
(2)For the difference between the characteristics of agencies that clients choose, the biggest gap was shown in the environmental characteristics of agencies, followed by characteristics of agency management, the quality of service, relationship between representatives and employees, and the characteristics of representatives.
(3)There was a significant discrepancy by gender in the quality of service whereas there is no distinct difference in the selection of agencies by education level. 
(4)While no different was found in clients' perception of the importance among the characteristics of representatives, those of agency location, and those of agency management, there was a significant gap between the quality of service and the relationship between representatives and employees. No distinct different was seen in the selection of agencies according to transaction types. Although there was no difference in the perception of the importance of representative characteristics, service quality, relationship between representatives and employees, and agency management, when selecting by the number of transactions, a significant discrepancy appeared in the environmental characteristics.1. 제목: 부동산 산업의 경제적 파급효과 분석
초록:
1.CONTENTS
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
The purpose of this study is to analyze how much Real Estate Industry contribute to national economy by measuring economic spreading effects of Real Estate Industry on national economy. 

(2) RESEARCH METHOD
To achieve the purpose of the study, the study uses an Real Estate Input-Output Table of year 2003 of korea. 
(3) RESEARCH RESULTS
The results shows that Real Estate Industry induce 274,530.8 billion won of national production, import inducement 13,7073.7 billion won, value-added 110,994.9 billion won, especially Real Estate Industry shows that production inducement coefficient is 1.36803, import inducement coefficient is 0.60581, value-added coefficient is 0.45189, income inducement coefficient is 0.18599 and employment inducement coefficient is 0.00841.

2. RESULTS 
Real Estate Business is small in size and scale, but Real Estate Industry contribute to national economy. For revitalization of Real Estate Industry, there should be the establishment of right knowledge on Real Estate Industry and proper steps for improving industrial system in the Real Estate.1.CONTENTS

제목: 부동산 전원주택의 이론적 접근과 미래 전망에 관한 기초적 연구
초록:
1. CONTENTS
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
Through this research, we look over the past transition process of Idyllic Housing and find out the causes of present Idyllic Housing problems. This research studies on these and suggests better Idyllic Housing's direction and future prospects. Moreover, this will help in ensuring that a better Real Estate culture is nurtured and adopted.

(2) RESEARCH METHOD
Reference to various documentary records, theses, and Internet

(3) RESEARCH RESULTS
For Idyllic Housings that satisfies both owners and government and develops continuously, fostering management mind of owners, creating various theme and efforts.
2. RESULTS
Idyllic Housing is one of the important factors that reflect the transition of a nation and society. Showing concerns in growth of our country's Idyllic Housing is exerted for a long term in lots of fields. However, still there are a lot of problems such as environmental pollution, lack of cooperation with the government and the application of ineffective laws and systems related to the national idyllic housing plan. To solve these problems, alternatives such as the reformation of the related laws and systems, support enterprises and the harmony with surrounding environment through the successive development plan. we continuously make plans for the future in order to meet the demand of people by apprehending the updated trend and analyzing the demand of Idyllic Housing. Constant efforts and researches are required in order to attain a brighter future.1. CONTENTS

제목: 부동산감정평가에 활용하기 위한 GIS 데이터 종류 및 포맷 연구 - 공공분야 데이터를 중심으로 -
초록: GIS는 부동산감정평가에서 공간자료 및 속성자료 수집, 저장, 분석에 그 효율성과 효과가 크게 나타날 뿐만 아니라 진보된 공간 분석과 모델링이 가능하다. 이렇게 효과적인 GIS는 감정평가사들에게 평가 업무에 있어 효율적인 의사결정을 지원할 수 있을 것이다. 그러나 GIS를 이용하여 효율적인 평가를 하기 위해서는 우선 공공분야에서 수집·관리하고 있는 데이터들을 잘 활용할 필요가 있으며, 부족한 데이터를 보완하여 신뢰성 있고 현실적인 자료 구축이 필요하다. 이러한 관점에서 본 연구는 평가 방법별로 필요한 데이터 목록을 작성하고 이들 자료들의 특성을 분석하고자 한다.Not only does GIS provide real estate appraisal fields with outstanding effectiveness to collection, storage, analysis of spatial and attributes data, but it also give them a chance to be possible for advanced spatial analysis and modelling.It might be providing effective way to decision making for those appraisers. In spite of advantages of appraisal using GIS, data collected from public fields preferentially need to be use and make it reliable. Therefore, this study made an inventory of data needed by appraisal method, analyzed features.Geographic Information System, Real Estate Appraisal, Data

제목: 부동산가격과 거시경제모형
초록: 본 논문은 신고전파적 성장모형에 토지를 도입한 조동철(2000)과 주택까지 도입한 확장모형을 통해 한 나라 지가와 주택가격의 동향에 관한 장기적인 시사점을 탐구한다. 장기에 토지의 실질가격증가율은 (실질)경제성장률과 같고, 주택의 실질가격증가율은 경제성장률에서 주택스톡의 증가율을 뺀 것과 같게 된다는 것이 모형의 시사점이다. 이 모형을 이용하여 1980년대 이래 우리나라 부동산가격의 동향을 고찰할 때 경제 전체로 일반적인 통념과는 달리 지가와 주택가격의 상승률이 지나치게 높다고 평가할 수 없다. 서울 아파트, 특히 강남아파트에 국한하여 보면 2000년대 들어 과도하게 상승한 것으로 평가된다. 그러나 서울 아파트 가격에 거품이 있다고 단정할 수는 없다.(JEL : E13, E50, O11)This paper investigates the long-run implication of real estate prices by reviewing and extending Dongchul Cho(2000), which is a variant of neoclassical growth model with land. According to these models, in the long run, the increase rate of real land price is equal to the growth rate of the economy, and that of real house price is less than the growth rate of the economy by the increase rate of the number of houses. Using these theoretic models this paper examines whether land and house prices in Korea have bubbles. It argues that there is no bubble in overall real estate prices. As for apartments located in Seoul metropolitan area, their prices rose "too high" since 2001, but one can not claim that there is a bubble in Seoul apartment prices.Land price, House price, Price bubble

제목: 부동산중개제도의 법적 과제 -공인중개사법을 중심으로-
초록:
부동산중개제도는 산업 자체의 고도화와 여건변화에 부응할 수 있는 제도개선의 필요성이 매우 높은 실정이다. 본 연구는 공인중개사의업무및부동산거래신고에관한법률이 시행된 지 1년반이 지난 지금 부동산중개제도를 선진적으로 발전시키기 위한 방향을 모색하고자 한다.
이제 우리나라의 부동산중개제도는 국가경제규모보다 국민의 재산권 보호 측면에서 볼 때 부동산중개업을 전문서비스업으로 육성시키고 전문성과 윤리성을 갖춘 전문직업인으로 인식될 수 있도록 전환시키는 제도적 장치가 시급하다. 따라서 공인중개사법을 중심으로 부동산중개제도의 현황과 문제점, 법적과제가 무엇인지 살펴보았다. 공인중개사법을 중심으로 부동산중개제도의 법적과제를 종합하여 정리하면 다음과 같다.
첫째, 거래당사자의 재산권보호를 위하여 손해배상책임제도의 업무보증금액을 상향하여야 하며, 중개대상물 확인ㆍ설명제도는 중개업자가 확인ㆍ설명할 수 있도록 조사권한을 대폭적으로 부여하여야 할 것이며, 계약금의 예탁제도가 정착될 수 있도록 의무화 또는 정착방안을 마련하여야 한다.
둘째, 부동산거래의 투명화를 위하여 실거래가 신고제도를 거래당사자에게 신고의무를 부여하는 방안으로 전환하여야 하며, 부동산중개계약의 서면화, 의무화, 또는 인센티브 부여를 통한 정착방안 마련 등의 제도개선이 이루어져야 하며, 부동산거래정보망의 단일화를 통한 관리방안이 마련되어야 할 것이다.
셋째, 부동산중개업 종사자제도 측면에서 공인중개사 제도를 전면적으로 재검토하여야 할 것이며, 사용인의 경우에 공인중개사만이 중개보조원이 될 수 있도록 하고 교육제도를 강화 하여 국민들에게 서비스할 수 있도록 제도개선이 이루어져야 할 것이다.
넷째, 기타 부동산중개제도와 관련하여 중개수수료 제도는 장기적으로 당사자합의로 할 수 있도록 하고, 중개보수를 성공보수보다는 행위보수체로 전환하는 방안도 고려하여야 할 것이다. 그리고 교육제도를 실무교육중심에서 보수교육중심으로 전환하여 시대적 상황에 따라
변화하는 제도와 정책들을 제대로 습득하여 국민의 재산권 거래를 담당할 수 있도록 하여야 할 것이다.Now the current real estate brokerage system requires improvement in answer to the more sophisticated real estate industry and circumstantial changes. This study intends to guide how to advance the real estate brokerage system, especially a year after the law regarding the operations of licensed real estate agents and real estate transaction report went into effect.
Now, considering protecting people's property rights, rather than the national economic scale, Korea's real estate brokerage system is in urgent need of a systematic mechanism which can develop real estate brokerage into professional services and elevate brokers to professionals with expertise and a sense of morality.
Hence, this study investigates the current status, problems, and legal tasks of Korean real estate brokerage system, mainly focusing on the law for licensed real estate agents. Listed below is a summary of legal tasks in relation to the real estate brokerage system, centering on the licensed real estate agent law.
First, in order to protect the property rights of the person engaged in a particular transaction, the amount of operational deposit related to the damage compensation system should be increased. As well, a system for verifying and describing brokerage objects ought to empower brokers with the right to investigation so that they can verify and describe their brokerage object. Furthermore, a plan to institute and stabilize the deposit system has to be prepared as well.
Second, for transparency in real estate dealings, the current transaction report system should be improved to oblige the person engaged in dealings to report actual transactions. Besides, systematic improvement is required, such as documenting and enforcing real estate brokerage contracts, or providing incentives. Additionally, a managerial plan has to be drawn up by integrating the intelligence network of real estate transactions.
Third, the current licensed real estate broker system should be thoroughly reexamined from the perspective of those participating in real estate brokerage. For users, a future system should guarantee that only licensed brokers can become brokerage assistants. Besides, the training system also has to be reinforced to provide quality services.
Fourth, for other real estate brokerage systems, the brokerage commission system should be based upon long-term agreement between contracting parties. Also, a plan for changing the brokerage payment system from a contingent fee to conduct-oriented fee has to be considered. Then, by replacing the practice-based training system with the fee-based one, brokers must be encouraged to fully understand systems and policies, which vary according to circumstances, before undertaking the dealings about people's property rights.Now the current real estate brokerage system requires improvement in answer to the more sophisticated real estate industry and circumstantial changes. This study intends to guide how to advance the real estate brokerage system, especially a year after the law regarding the operations of licensed real estate agents and real estate transaction report went into effect.
Now, considering protecting people's property rights, rather than the national economic scale, Korea's real estate brokerage system is in urgent need of a systematic mechanism which can develop real estate brokerage into professional services and elevate brokers to professionals with expertise and a sense of morality.
Hence, this study investigates the current status, problems, and legal tasks of Korean real estate brokerage system, mainly focusing on the law for licensed real estate agents. Listed below is a summary of legal tasks in relation to the real estate brokerage system, centering on the licensed real estate agent law.
First, in order to protect the property rights of the person engaged in a particular transaction, the amount of operational deposit related to the damage compensation system should be increased. As well, a system for verifying and describing brokerage objects ought to empower brokers with the right to investigation so that they can verify and describe their brokerage object. Furthermore, a plan to institute and stabilize the deposit system has to be prepared as well.
Second, for transparency in real estate dealings, the current transaction report system should be improved to oblige the person engaged in dealings to report actual transactions. Besides, systematic improvement is required, such as documenting and enforcing real estate brokerage contracts, or providing incentives. Additionally, a managerial plan has to be drawn up by integrating the intelligence network of real estate transactions.
Third, the current licensed real estate broker system should be thoroughly reexamined from the perspective of those participating in real estate brokerage. For users, a future system should guarantee that only licensed brokers can become brokerage assistants. Besides, the training system also has to be reinforced to provide quality services.
Fourth, for other real estate brokerage systems, the brokerage commission system should be based upon long-term agreement between contracting parties. Also, a plan for changing the brokerage payment system from a contingent fee to conduct-oriented fee has to be considered. Then, by replacing the practice-based training system with the fee-based one, brokers must be encouraged to fully understand systems and policies, which vary according to circumstances, before undertaking the dealings about people's property rights.real estate brokerage system, real estate brokerage, Act concerning Report of Purchases or Sales of Real Estate Property and the Real Estate Agents' Duty, system for reporting real trade prices of real estate agencies, transparency of real estate dealings. certified real estate brokers.

제목: 부동산투자회사(Reits)제도의 운용현황과 발전방향
초록: 부동산투자회사제도가 우리나라에 도입된 이후 몇 차례에 걸친 법 개정이 이루어 졌으나, 여전히 불합리한 법제도상의 문제점을 안고 있는 실정이다. 이러한 맥락에서 본 논문은 부동산투자회사제도의 그 운용현황 및 특성을 분석하고 문제점 및 발전방안을 제시하는데 연구의 목적을 둔다. 연구의 결과는 첫째, 리츠에 대한 기본인식의 전환 필요성이다. 기본적으로 도관체적 논리에 충실한 제도운용이 필요하다. 자기관리형 리츠나 위탁관리형 리츠 모두 설립목적과 투자대상 등 운용측면에서는 동일하나 법인설립형태의 차이만으로 인해 직접관리와 위탁관리 방식으로 구분되고 법인세혜택이 차등 적용되는 것은 제도의 도입목적에 우선하기 보다는 지나치게 형식에 치우친 측면이 있다. 리츠제도의 기본개념이 투자도관체라는 점에서 법인형태가 명목회사이든 실질회사이든간에 투자도관체로서의 기능을 정상적으로 발휘한다면 당연히 이중과세문제를 해결하기 위한 법인세 면제혜택이 주어져야 할 것이다. 둘째, 감독기관의 정비를 통한 관리·감독의 효율성 제고이다. 부동산투자회사법상 일반부동산투자회사는 건설교통부의 인가와 감독을 받아야 하며, 구조조정부동산투자회사는 건설교통부의 인가와 함께 금융감독원의 감독도 받도록 되어 있다. 따라서 금융감독원은 동일한 법에 있는 두 회사에 대하여 일반부동산투자회사에 대해서는 전혀 관여하지 않는 반면, 구조조정부동산투자회사에 대해서는 인가 및 감독에 참여하고 있는 기형적인 구조이며, 회사입장에서 이중의 감독을 받는 부담을 지고 있다. 셋째, 유사 제도의 정비를 통한 제도운용의 효율성 제고이다. 즉 자산운용업법상의 부동산펀드는 그 성격상 부동산투자회사법상의 리츠와 유사하지만 주무관청을 달리하면서 병행 운용되고 있어 제도의 비효율성을 초래하고 있는데 대한 정비가 필요하다. 넷째, 개발전문리츠의 도입에 따른 개발사업의 위험관리시스템 구축이 필요하다. 무분별한 개발사업에 대한 적절한 통제장치와 합리적인 시장성 및 사업성분석을 평가하는 시스템이 전제되지 않는 이상 개발사업의 리스크는 전적으로 투자자에게 전가될 수밖에 없다. 리츠의 근원적 속성이 소극적(passive)인 투자활동과 자산운용을 함으로써 리스크 저감을 통한 투자자를 보호한다는데 있음을 주지해야 한다. 다섯째, 이중과세(double taxation)문제와 조세의 형평성 문제 극복이다. 여섯째, 겸업제한규정의 완화로 자산관리회사의 적정성장 유도이다. 전문적인 부동산자산운용업무가 정착되어 있지 않은 국내 부동산시장의 상황에서 자산관리회사의 겸업제한규정은 자산관리회사의 수익모델부재를 야기하고 있다. 현재 설립되어 있는 자산관리회사의 경우 궁여지책으로 신탁업진출을 통해 수익모델개선을 모색하고 있으나 근본적으로는 자산관리회사의 일정규모이하의 직접투자, 개발사업시행 등 부동산관련 제반 사업에 진출할 수 있도록 겸업제한규정의 완화를 통해 전문적인 부동산운용회사의 성장을 유도해야 할 것이다. 이외에도 자산운용관련 전문인력의 양성, 구조조정리츠 존속기간에의 탄력성 부여 등의 발전방안을 제시 하였다.Amendment of REITs Act has been made ever since REITs system was introduced into Korea. But there still retains a lot of unreasonable problems in that system. In this context, this study is to analyze the application situation and characteristics of REITs and to propose the development program. The findings of this study suggest various development programs as follows ; the necessity of basic perception toward REITs system, enhancement of efficiency of REITs management including improvement of similar systems, establishment of risk management system in real estate development followed by new REITs products devoted for real estate development REITs, solution for double taxation and tax equity, promotion of reasonable growth for AMC(Asset Management Company) through relaxation of prohibition of sidetrade, training the professionals in asset management, and flexibility for duration of CR-REITs(Corporate Restructuring REITs).Reits, Real Estate Investment Trusts, Asset Management Co. Double Taxaton, CR-Reits

제목: 부동산투자신탁(REITs)의 상관성에 관한 연구
초록: 지금까지 부동산투자신탁(REITs)에 관한 연구는 부동산 수익률과 타 자산 수익률 사이의 관계에 초점을 두고 연구되어 왔으나, 최근에는 부동산수익률과 자본시장의 자산수익률과의 관계 등 보다 미시적 측면으로 접근하는 경향이 있다. 이에 본 연구에서는 우리나라의 부동산투자신탁과 타 자본시장의 자산수익률과의 상관성을 실증적으로 검증하고자 REITs와 주식 및 채권의 수익-위험 분석을 통해 REITs의 특성을 분석하였다. 상승장과 하락장의 두가지 형태로 분석한 결과 REITs는 시장상승기보다 시장하락기에 KOSPI지수와 더 밀접하게 연동하는 경향이 높은 것으로 나타났다. 게다가 2가지 패턴인 (1)시장 상황에 따른 REITs와 소형가치주와의 관계, (2)REITs와 소형주와의 관계로 나누어 분석한 결과, REITs 베타에서는 소형주효과를 확인할 수 있었으며, 우리나라 REITs시장에서는 비대칭성이 존재하는 것으로 나타났다.The relationship between real estate returns and the returns of other asset classes has been the focus of many academic studies. Recent studies have documented a curious aspect in the relationship between real estate returns and capitalization equity returns. We examine the correlation between the return of Korean Real Estate Trusts(REITs) and the other assets. We analyze the characteristics of REITs in term of risk and return by comparing with the other stocks and bonds.We find that the returns on equity REITs have different risk and return properties in advancing and declining markets. The finding relies on analysis showing that REITs returns more closely track the returns of the KOSPI Index when the general stock market is declining than when it is advancing. Moreover, we test two explanations for this pattern, namely (1) the REITs and Small-value stock effects; (2) the REITs and Small stock effects. The result of our empirical study shows that the small stock effects in betas are found to satisfactorily describe the beta pattern in REITs. We also find that the existence of asymmetry in REITs markets.REITs, Return-Risk, Correlation, Asymmetry

제목: 부동산상품개발에 관한 일고
초록:
1. CONTENTS
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
Suppliers of real estate goods, constructors, developers and sellers, do their best to develop products that satisfy consumers' desire who prefer better spaces. As a result, real estate goods have been improved. Such trends are presented in this paper, which is hoped to help suppliers to make preferred goods and spaces.
(2) RESEARCH METHOD
This paper presents recent trends of real estate goods improvement based largely on experiences in business home and abroad. 
(3) RESEARCH FINDINGS
Real estate goods types examined are condominuim, studio apartment and office.
Improvements are analyzed with respect to decision of type of goods, decision of size and improvements at specific points. In addition to decision of type of goods and size, this paper presents 13 improvements of condominiums, 2 improvements of studio apartments and 3 improvements of offices.

2. RESULTS
13 improvements of condominiums are about a use of corner of living room, a use of hall at entrance, making bathroom with view, division of bathroom and restroom, making bathroom with dress room and so on. 2 improvements of studio apartments are about division of residential/business use by floor and installation of public rest room at each floor. 3 improvements of offices are about selling by smaller size, making smoking area at nonsmoking office buildings and making public conference room, reception room and public warehouses.1. 제목: 부동산 조세정책에 대한 평가 및 제안
초록:
1. CONTENTS
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
Recently new government set up a new policy plan for real estate market in Korea from the perspective of real estate tax structure reform. But, considering the fact the tax instrument has a wide variety of effects in allocation resources in the market, it must be considered that the expected results and the direction of the market movement in relation to legal and economic logical structure. More than that, to achieve the policy goal, designing an atmosphere of tax compliance rather than controlling the market behavior of economic agents must be checked out throughly. In this way, I try to see the matter through economic incentives as well as legal environments to reache a conclusion.
(2) Research Method
I adopted law and economics perspective into the real estate tax policy of new government. I tried to explain the fact that the policy mechanism should be implemented in line with prerequisite conditions such as tax information data base, tax compliance and administrative cost.

2. RESULT
Prior researches and court cases were dealt to check the validity of real estate tax policy. As result, new government real estate policy tends to be doable although there still much rooms for considerations.1. CONTENTS

제목: 부동산컨설팅업의 활성화 방안에 관한 연구
초록:
1. CONTENTS
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
The purpose of this study is to revitalize the real estate consulting in Korea using the survey for specialists of real estate.

(2) RESEARCH METHOD
This study was focused on survey analysis. The data for this analysis were collect from the questionnaire. This questionnaire consisted of the status of real estate market in Korea and the problems of real estate consulting regime. Especially this study used to the cross tabulation analysis and the analysis of variance(ANOVA).
(3) RESEARCH FINDINGS
In the results of this survey, the most important problem is the absent of certificated licence of real estate consulting in Korea. 

2. RESULTS
This study offers two alternatives to improve the real estate consulting in Korea. 1) It is strongly suggested introducing an authorized licence system for real estate consulting. 2) But, it is restricted the specialists having an experts in real estate market.1. CONTENTS

제목: 부동산서비스업의 기업윤리와 사회적 역할에 관한 일고
초록:
1. CONTENTS
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
Through research of corporate ethics of real estate service business followed by the changing real estate environment and its social role and responsibilities. 
The object of this thesis is to raise the importance of corporate ethics and the social role of real estate service business.

(2) RESEARCH METHOD
This study adopted the existing theoretical literature review. Domestic and overseas materials such as paper, books, etc. are used.

(3) RESEARCH RESULT
The corporate ethics and the social role of real estate service business are very important to enhance the quality of circulation. 

2. RESULT
In modern society, service enterprise will face many growth opportunities as well as be threatened. For such an environment, to survive, grow, and develop service business, the enterprise must start to newly reform.
Real estate service business should promise with new innovative thinking and actions to renovate several behind aspects compared with the manufacturing business.
To improve the real estate service business, in terms of ethics, professional management enterprise should be made in order to enhance the quality of circulation. 
In addition, to increase the consumer confidence of the real estate service business industry, service quality for consumer, namely, customer should be enhanced, and employee management should be maintained throughout. 
To support the real estate service business circle corresponded with rapidly changing real estate environment, public sectors, as well as civil business circles are needed to promote service ethics.1. CONTENTS

제목: 부동산거래사기죄의 형법적 고찰
초록:
1. CONTENTS
(1) RESEARCH OBJECTIVES
Penal offender in realty has special aspects regarding registration in the types of his or her actions. In this thesis, I will try to examine realty transaction incidents focusing on theory and types realty transaction fraud on penal law. 

(2) RESEARCH METHOD
Rerfering to recent judgment and diverse dissertations related to premise trust system I examined the type and case of premise title trust
(3) RESEARCH FINDINGS
Realty fraud is a case in which one deceives persons so that he or she occupies the realty or acquires owner title, and the type of deception, consummated time, and triangular fraud in which the deceived, and victim are different from each other must be examined. 

2. RESULTS
Realty crime is distinguished from civil legal relation regarding right/duty between private persons and administrative action for the realization of administrative purpose. Especially, even in the case that fraud victim will ultimately be able to acquire effective right on the law of civil affairs or he or she were granted corresponding compensation, formability of fraud must be considered.1. 제목: 부동산 이중매매에 관한 연구
초록:
매도인이 부동산을 제1매수인에게 매도한 후 그 부동산을 제2매수인과 별도의 매매계약을 체결하고, 소유권이전등기까지 완료하는 경우를 부동산 이중매매라 한다. 일반적으로 부동산 이중매매의 주된 보호의 대상은 제1매수인이다. 다수설과 판례는 반사회적 무효설의 입장에서 제2매수인이 매도인의 배임행위에 적극 가담한 경우에 부동산 이중매매는 민법 제103조 반사회적 법률행위에 해당하여 무효라고 하고 이 무효는 이른바 절대적 무효로서 선의의 제3자도 대항하지 못한다고 한다. 이로 인하여 제2매수인으로부터 매수한 선의의 전득자는 보호를 받을 수 없게 된다. 그러나 아직 등기를 갖추지 않아 완전한 소유자가 되지 않은 제1매수인을 선의로 부동산을 취득하여 등기까지 갖춘 전득자보다 더 두텁게 보호하는 것은 불합리하다.
이 논문은 이러한 부동산 이중매매의 법리에 관한 학설을 검토한 후 최근 판례의 동향을 살펴보면서 제2매수인으로부터 매수한 선의의 전득자를 보호할 수 있는 방안을 제시하고 있다.After the seller sells their real estate to the first purchaser, the seller goes on to conclude a separate contract with a second purchaser and completes a registration of transfer of ownership. This kind of case is called a real estate double contract. Generally speaking, the main party who is to be protected against double contracts in real estate is the first purchaser. According to various views and case studies, they take on the anti-social nullification perspective and states that double contracts in real estates fall under the category of Civil Law No. 103 anti-social illegal activity and will therefor become void. This void is considered absolute and cannot be contested even by an innocent third party. As a result, the innocent party who had purchased the property in question from the second purchaser cannot be protected. However, it appears to be unreasonable to protect the first purchaser who has not registered his property so that he is not yet a complete owner even further than the innocent purchaser who is in possession of the property deed through to all intents and purposes what they consider legal means.
This paper aims to investigate into the theories concerning the above mentioned real estate double contracts' legal principles. Then, trends in recent precedents will be looked at in the hopes of coming up with methods to protect the third and fourth innocent buyers who has purchased property from the second purchaser.After the seller sells their real estate to the first purchaser, the seller goes on to conclude a separate contract with a second purchaser and completes a registration of transfer of ownership.
